</header><div class="content-slider"  data-control="content-slider"><section class="content-slider-mask"><div id="vip-access-grid" class="tile-grid cf">   {{#each hotelList}} <article     class="col tile tile-no-header tile-no-footer"><a class="tile-link" href="{{hotelURL}}&rfrr=Rewards.VIP.Hotel.1"><section class="tile-content"><!-- index +1 ?--><div class="vip-image-wrap"><figure  class="image aspect-ratio1-1  vip-badge rebranded"  data-media-type="image"       data-src="//images.trvl-media.com/media/content/shared/images/rewards/vip/vip.png"   data-aspect-ratio="1-1"   data-class="tile-media"><img src="//images.trvl-media.com/media/content/shared/images/rewards/vip/vip.png" alt="" class="tile-media"/></figure><div class="gradient"></div><figure  class="image aspect-ratio16-9  vip-image"  data-media-type="image"       data-src="//images.trvl-media.com{{imageURL}}"   data-aspect-ratio="16-9"   data-class="tile-media"><img src="//images.trvl-media.com{{imageURL}}" alt="" class="tile-media"/></figure></div><div class="box tile-details"><h4 class="tile-name">{{name}}</h4><p><strong class="star-rating rating-tertiary star rating"><span class="visuallyhidden">{{starRating}} / 5.0</span><span class="icon icon-stars{{starRatingClass starRating}} stars-black value-title" title="{{starRating}}" aria-hidden="true"></span></strong></p><p class="secondary">{{city}}, {{stateOrCountry}}</p><p class="secondary tile-price ">{{getDiscountedPrice formattedBaseRate formattedAdjustedRate}}</p></div></section></a></article>                {{/each}} </div></section>
</div>
    </section>
</script>

<script type="text/x-handlebars-template" id="geography-section">
    <section class="box">
        <header>
        <h4>{{headerMessage}}</h4>
        </header>
        {{#forEachGeographyOption geoConfigItems}}
        <figure class="geo-item">
            <a href="/Hotel-Search?sort=vip&destination={{location}}{{#if ../geoParentName}}, {{../../geoParentName}}{{/if}}"
               data-geo="{{location}}" data-count="{{numHotels}}" data-formatted-hotel-count="{{numHotels}} 家酒店">
                {{#if ../geoParentName}}
                    <span class="geo-label">{{location}} ({{numHotels}})</span>
                {{/if}}
                {{#unless ../geoParentName}}
                    <div class="geo-picture unselected" style='background-image:url({{regionImage "bw"}})'></div>
                    <div class="geo-picture selected" style='background-image:url({{regionImage "color"}})'></div>
                    <div class="geo-picture geo-picture-overlay"></div>
                    <span class="geo-key-label">{{location}}</span>
                    <span class="geo-count-label">{{numHotels}} 家酒店</span>
                {{/unless}}
            </a>
        </figure>
        {{/forEachGeographyOption}}
    </section>
</script>
                    </span>
                </div>

<span id="vip-browse-navigation-modal-loader"       class=" loader-primary loader-light loader loader-animated  loading" aria-hidden="true" title="Loading..."></span>                </script>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>
</div>
